website_summaries.verdict: Silicone bristles will last a long time in your shower, are anti-allergen and mold resistant.
pros: Silicone bristles will dry quickly after you shower
Comes with a handheld massage brush
Sturdy enough to scrub, but not rough
cons: Brush doesn't tend to suds up as much as some other scrubbers

customer_reviews.title: Great for massaging and cleaning hard places to reach on your body
customer_reviews.text: I like the long handle for reaching my back and lower body parts. It's great for massaging also. I use the hand scrubber for massaging my scalp and joints. It's great for blood circulation. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: rev don

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: The products I received were fast shipping. I love that they're made of silicone (antibacterial) and not brushes (which can cause microcuts). It is an awesome length and comes with a cellulite brush that I have yet to try! Super happy with my purchase and would certainly buy again. I wish they came in different colors but I love the green! :D
customer_reviews.author: StevieNicole

customer_reviews.title: Great handy bathing brush
customer_reviews.text: This is a big help. Soft brush and doesn’t hurt my skin. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: joanjettfan

customer_reviews.title: Stays cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Tpok a few weeks to get use to the feel. I like it and glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: neuronweb

customer_reviews.title: Silicone bristles work well
customer_reviews.text: The silicone bristles are very gentle. I have very sensitive skin and this works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality brush
customer_reviews.text: This high quality soft silicone brush cleans easily and does not get mildew like the other wooden brushes that I had before. My wife and I both use it and love it.
customer_reviews.author: VINCE

customer_reviews.title: Works AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Tons of bubbles! I love this silicon body brush and massager. Silicon is far more hygienic than a regular bristle brush, which can hold bacteria. It’s easy to clean the silicon brush! Feels very expensive and heavy duty, it definitely gets the job done! Flip it on the other side and you got yourself a nice exfoliation. My order also came with a cellulite massager. I use this in the shower along with the silicon shower brush. I typically put some sort of scrub on it so that way I can massage my thighs and exfoliate as well.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift from a wish list. Really sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Aspitalieri

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: In my opion this scrub worked well for me. I really like how it was made out of silicon and that its easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: The brush is not really what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: The brush is pretty flimsy. I find it hard to scrub with it. The cellulite massager is interesting. We'll see if it helps!
customer_reviews.author: Grandmotherbear3

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and very effective
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several body brushes/ back scrubbers and this one was definitely my favorite. The bristles are soft, but not too soft (one problem I had with the others) so they actually clean and give a good massage. The additional hand held brush is wonderful too and I find I’m using it more than my dry brush because it doesn’t hurt, easier to hold and use and honestly feel it’s more effective because the nodules really get into the muscles. The back scrubber (and hand held) are very good quality that should last for a while and it has a hole in handle, so I can hang it up. Very pleased with this purchase and this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Leto74

customer_reviews.title: It was worth the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!! The color matches my bathroom. It works amazingly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just an ok product
customer_reviews.text: CONS: Product is TOO soft. I bought it to replace my brush/loofa combo to scrub the middle of my back or other to reach other areas like feet.to remove dead skin cells. Neither of the tools are effective for this. PROS: The items are attractive and easy to clean. They do not harbor mildew like a loofa or traditional back brush. Bothe items and all three surfaces are fine for just soaping up, which could actually be done by hand. The nubby side of the brush works fine for applying in-shower or standard moisturizing lotion.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kaufmann

customer_reviews.title: Does not lather with body wash. Handle bends easily when applying pressure to scrub.
customer_reviews.text: Did not lather when I used it with body wash. Disappointing. I was hoping to find something to help wash my back and shoulders. The handle is flimsy. It bends while applying pressure when scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Grunkukan

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, but to soft to scrub your back well, and it doesn't even give a good scratch for a itchy back! Very disappointed. I thought it would be a lot firmer bristles than what it has, very soft bendable ones. Not sure what it will be good for, probably toss it. Which makes me sick.
customer_reviews.author: Eyes wide openTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I love it <3 Better than expected! Bought it just so I could lotion my back (shoulder disability makes this a movement I should not do), but I love the feel of the brushes and actually enjoy using them! Yesterday to wind down before bed, instead of reading a book I listened to music while lotioning my legs with the larger green brush. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I needed to purchase this due to my cycling accident I could not reach parts of my back with my arm when I apply the cream that I need to have applied to my back for pain which is Sombra I would purchase this if I was in pain you can purchase it at Sombra online or Walmart
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Bacne no more!
customer_reviews.text: I had broken out on my back really bad and needed something to reach area without near dislocating my shoulder. I was also looking for something that wouldn't harbor bacteria. This back scrubber along with body acne soap have cleared me completely. Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs O

customer_reviews.title: body brush scrubbers
customer_reviews.text: I was suprised but yes, I love the body brush back scrubber. It is unlike all I have used before but looks and feels great. I did not like the smaller brush. It did not work well. Soap just sits on it. I feel it is a wasteful product,because I wont use it. I like to feel lathered and this could not do it. At least the long scrubber worked so not a total waste.
customer_reviews.author: ila

customer_reviews.title: Works just as well as a regular bristle brush
customer_reviews.text: This works just as well as a standard bristle brush. I used the palm brush to bathe my German shepherd with. It worked pretty well but getting hair out of it is pretty difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Miller

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and gentle but honestly it doesn’t get you feeling clean regardless what soap I’ve used. It’s TOO soft and the bristles are really flexible. It needs some extra stability in my opinion. Handle is nice and comfortable to hold. The head scrubber thing is awful. No one in our family likes it but that could just be us.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Clifton

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I mean it cost nearly the same as buying the cellulite scrubber so I just bought this set. I wish the green scrubber was a little more hard and not as soft but ok.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to apply moisturizer to my back. It works perfectly. The silicone bristles are soft when you rub it onto your skin & it's an easy clean up after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Paco3185

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work quite liked I hoped. Maybe cause I’m used to a brush.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Little

customer_reviews.title: Prefect tool for the shower!!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was was looking for. I use it with shower gel. It holds it well. Just have to make sure that you don’t over load it or it will go all over the place. The handle is long enough to reach those areas that are sometimes hard to reach. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: EBG

customer_reviews.title: That pink freeby is the worst
customer_reviews.text: The green one has a soft sorta hair-like side that feels really good and it seems like is easy to clean. The red freeby by the way is so tough and does not retain liquid soap really well so I really dislike it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabo Palacios

customer_reviews.title: Brush is way too soft and does not hold much foam
customer_reviews.text: It does not clean my back well. The brush should be much firmer and designed to hold some foam from your soap or shower gel, which it does not... at all...
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: As someone who is disabled and who just had knee surgery this item is perfect. 1. It’s antibacterial and 2 it’s soft and the long handle makes it easier to wash my leg since I can’t stand up and bend my knee. It is gentle easily cleaned off.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Soft to touch!
customer_reviews.text: The back scrubber is very soft silicone and anti slip on the grip. The body scrub is also a great way to get yourself relaxed after a hard day of work. It massages your skin in the right power
customer_reviews.author: A Tian

customer_reviews.title: Won't slough skin
customer_reviews.text: Want really what i was looking for. Green has very soft bristles ( not the kind of scrub i want), or hard stubs. Don't like the cellulite brush
customer_reviews.author: Helen M.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to reach my back, but the softness doesn't do much for me. I ended up getting some long scrub clothes. I'm sure this would be great for anyone use to stick type items.
customer_reviews.author: Chana Rivka

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Had to add soap 3 x to complete shower. Difficult to wash upper back. Head too small to hang on shower rack between uses. Ended up buying a different back brush which I am very happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Soft bristles, but gets the job done and good package deal
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty soft, I wish the long bristles had more stiffness and structure. I wanted an antimicrobial body exfoliator that wasn’t all plastic or would get mildewed after a few months. I really liked the extra exfoliator / cellulite massager that came with. Has good reach and will get the job done for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Kandi B

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but...
customer_reviews.text: I really hate the sensation of these materials against my skin. Just a personal preference I think; I wanted to give it a shot though!
customer_reviews.author: prettypixels

customer_reviews.title: Too small of a brush head and slippery grip
customer_reviews.text: While I like how easy to clean it is and the massage part of the brush, the brush itself is so soft it can’t compare to a buff puff let alone a normal back brush. The major problems are the grip is slippery and the surface area of the brush is really small. Also I wish it had a string attached for storage like most other back scrubbers.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great scrubber
customer_reviews.text: The back scrubber reaches all those hard to reach places and makes me feel great. The body scrubber is harder than I like but I use it on my scalp and it feels like I am getting a massage.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very relaxing.
customer_reviews.text: This brush is good for cellulite.. just work in a upward motion and see it work Use in the shower with your shower gel or out with your favorite lotion.
customer_reviews.author: sharon simmons

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great for exfoliating skin. Soft side for gentle scrubbing , nubby side for circulation. Can't go wrong. Pink one really be careful use gentle pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio native

customer_reviews.title: Too soft and doesn't lather with soap
customer_reviews.text: Too soft, doesn't lather with soap and does a poor job cleaning the body. Would not recommend the green brush but the pink one is aright.
customer_reviews.author: DDorrell

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to scrub my back in the shower. I absolutely love it. It hangs perfectly on a hook in my shower. It’s easy to keep clean since it’s silicone. I would recommend it to anybody who is looking for that extra reach in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t prefer
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product at all... Doesn’t feel like it does anything when i use on my back/chest..
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love both of these. They really smooth out my skin, easy to clean, and don’t mildew.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally one that doesn't break!
customer_reviews.text: No mold and they don't break. The manufacturer should make them a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hazany

customer_reviews.title: Not useful
customer_reviews.text: Handle is too long for me and I don’t have any use of the extra (pink) scrubber.
customer_reviews.author: MoTiki

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT Create Suds
customer_reviews.text: I guess it was an okay product and did what is was supposed to. However, I dislike how the back brush doesn’t create suds or lather well.
customer_reviews.author: Malay Halder

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I liked the Softness of bristles and 2-sided textures. I’m going to use one for soaping my feet and the other side for massaging lotion
customer_reviews.author: Yomo

customer_reviews.title: Great Combo!
customer_reviews.text: Good product! Easy to use, the body brush is perfect for massage and the back brush scrub is soft and good size. Great combo!
customer_reviews.author: MariaElena

customer_reviews.title: Leaves your skin soft afterwards
customer_reviews.text: I use this in shower, not going to lie it leaves your skin soft afterwards with some scrubbing in back and front.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Better then bristles
customer_reviews.text: The long handle back brush works good. But the round thing...not so much. We use it as a dog brush
customer_reviews.author: Robert Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great price and love the long handle
customer_reviews.text: I love the CINLITEK Body Brush Back Scrubber! Works great to scrub your back!
customer_reviews.author: mkb

customer_reviews.title: Its alright
customer_reviews.text: It does the job...wish I can find a rough back scratcher.
customer_reviews.author: LaDia M Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Gentle scrubber
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for a good price. Better than a loofah.
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the scrubbers the stick one is a bid heavier duty but love it
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Not for the shower
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t hold product and it’s just not something I’d use to clean myself
customer_reviews.author: kendra

customer_reviews.title: This is a shower brush that does not scratch!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush because it's easy on the skin it's soft enough that it doesn't scratch but tough enough that it can clean with soap and water. I've never had one before and I wish I had tried one sooner. It's good quality and a pretty color green also.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good.
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought it for the longer body brush back scrubber. But ended up liking the smaller pink one a lot. Since it is easier to use and it feels like it promotes blood circulation when used. Great products.
customer_reviews.author: girlinyellowdress

customer_reviews.title: Aaahhh!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is fabulous! Strong and long enough to reach your back! My husband loves it
customer_reviews.author: watz2344

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on Skin
customer_reviews.text: Brush hold soap well, and is gentle on my skin. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Read

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, small flaws
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my brush. I wanted something easier to keep clean. I'm pleased but there are 2 things I knocked stars off for. One, is that the long scrubber has a hole in the center of the bristles. I put glue on it, but the hole goes into the brush head and will gather water, soap, skin, etc. Defeats the purpose of being cleaner. Second, the body scrubber came with a large nib already broken. I'll keep them, but won't buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Manic Maenad

customer_reviews.title: Soft and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, it’s simple and useful! The material is soft which won’t be damage to my skin, meanwhile, it’s easy to clean up after use!
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: If you use liquid body soap it will just sink to the base of the bristles and won't suds up. Had to switch back to loofah.
customer_reviews.author: DCHoo

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: I like this brush a lot because it is very soft and works great over the most sensitive areas of skin.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This bath body brush did not meet my expectations. It was rather heavy for me and did not convey the soap onto my back or body. It didn't scrub well either when I applied soap to my skin directly. I was disappointed and ended up throwing it away. It was well made and looked nice. It just didn't work well for its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: CidyLouWho

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I'm not exactly in-love with this product. It looks exactly as pictured, but just doesn't work as well as I had hoped. It doesn't really get a lather going at all for one. Also, I wanted the long handle to get my back more easily, but it gets so slippery that I don't fell like I'm really able to reach anything better than before; the slight curve in the handle doesn't help either because it pushes the brush outward. The only reason I'm giving this 2 stars is because it is as advertised and I DO like the cellulite massager that came with it. Definitely wouldn't recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JBreeze

customer_reviews.title: Scrub a dub dub
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love both of these silicone shower/bath body scrubbers. The one for your back is nice because it’s actually kind of weighted and you can press it into your back so it can exfoliate better than other light weight long handled back scrubbers I have used . The handheld pink one is nice, especially for me since I have no feeling in my hands so I’ll drop things quite often. Because you can slide your whole hand into the top of the pink one it makes it quite easy to hold onto. I feel like it gives me a massage and exfoliation because it is quite hard but not sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Party of 7

customer_reviews.title: A back scrubber to dream about
customer_reviews.text: The scalp massager is too large for me, to handle easily. But, the scrubber to die for. I bought it after I got another case of shingles (itch) and a reaction to my immunotherapy med (rash that ITCHES like crazy). Needless to say I needed something to scratch the itches without breaking the skin and causing more issues. Highly recommend the back scrubber. Gets the job done easily but with no injury to the skin. Perfect! In fact, I ordered a 2nd one for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these, especially for the price. The green brush is great because it is very soft and it allows me to reach areas I can’t like my back. It’s way better than using a regular body brush because the silicone tips feel more gentle. The neon green color is fun too. The cellulite brush is cool because I can actually feel it working on my legs. I mainly use it on the back of my legs where I have cellulite and I can just feel the circulation and I feel like it’s working. It’s not a soft feeling, it feels more like it’s working out my skin. So far, I’m impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Victoria

customer_reviews.title: The smaller one is a mystery
customer_reviews.text: I never used a silicone bath scrub before. That said, the smaller scrub was disappointing for me because it doesn’t lather or spread soap well. It’s bumpy non absorbent pad doesn’t pick up soap and feels like it’s meant to massage rather than scrub clean. I like the green back scrub though, even though it doesn’t lather either. It at least has bristles that scrub the skin gently. Going to keep using the back scrub but am looking for another small loofa.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Both my husband and I like this brush. It lathers and is easy to use. I like that it is lightweight and relatively small, making it easy to maneuver on my back. The other plus is that it is all one piece and seems like everything rinses off, making it easy to clean and making it difficult for mold/mildew/bacteria to grow. I have not used the pink massage tool and don't expect to as it's pretty hard and just not for me. But overall we are pleased with the back scrubber. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: SLA

customer_reviews.title: Love This
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with silicone. With that being said I was excited to come across this when shopping to replace a back brush which I do every few months. It came today and found it’s absolutely perfect! I used liquid soap but bar soap would work too. Not stiff but did leave my skin feeling thoroughly cleaned 😊
customer_reviews.author: Sheree

customer_reviews.title: back brush is great
customer_reviews.text: I like the back brush but the body brush isn't super helpful. The back brush works great but the body brush kind of hurts on legs.
customer_reviews.author: MY

customer_reviews.title: Move on
customer_reviews.text: These just don’t work. I got them because I thought it would be easy to keep them clean, and it was. However, they don’t work for their purpose of helping to keep me clean.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Itchy Back
customer_reviews.text: I love this bath brush combo. Silcone bristles are soft but washes by back and any other part without scratching me. I have sensitive skin so this is wonderful. Would definitely purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: G. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: This is okay
customer_reviews.text: The back brush doesn't seem to hit certain spots on my back for whatever reason. It works for me, just doesn't seem to scrub as well as a natural bristle brush. I do like that these doesn't hold hair and they are more sanitary than other brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Cora5

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Feel clean after using it!
customer_reviews.text: The back brush is great. My husband and I both use it daily. The other hand held hasn’t been used. It quickly became a toy for our toddler. Can’t win against a toddler!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Happy Back!
customer_reviews.text: I always used the scrubby type back brushes which don’t last too long. I love this brush! Stays clean and feels great on your back. The bristles are soft and give a nice massage. This even feels nice washing the bottom of your feet too! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: MJ Chappy

customer_reviews.title: Easy touse
customer_reviews.text: Soft bristles, extra long handle and easy to use and clean. I hurt my left hand and couldn’t bathe with it, this was the perfect solution and extra help I needed
customer_reviews.author: KAZ

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The brush works okay, and is easy to clean but the bristles seem a bit too soft. The handle is vey rigid and is difficult for me to maneuver, since I have arthritis. It might help for the handle to be somewhat flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Emerald

customer_reviews.title: Handle too short for bathing but great for cleaning the tub!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my spouse but he didn't like it. Use it now to scrub the tub and works well for that with the vinegar/Dawn mixture in a spray bottle that I use.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry S

customer_reviews.title: Body Brush
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It feels great to your back. I thought it would be a problem putting soap on it, but it wasn't . It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Craft

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly as described, so very happy. Will make bathing ,for disabled or health, person much better. Love the feel if bristles, soft but cleansing.
customer_reviews.author: Connie O'Keefe EdwardsTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Too soft of Bristles
customer_reviews.text: The back brush is too soft, it barely feels as if it's scrubbing anything no matter how much pressure you apply.
customer_reviews.author: Monster

customer_reviews.title: Good shower tool
customer_reviews.text: Helping to make washing my back easier and noticing smoother skin. Easy to use. Dries quickly. Good weight.
customer_reviews.author: Empress

customer_reviews.title: bends too easily
customer_reviews.text: Should have known better- more Chinese junk sold on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: H. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold soap
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice back scratcher in the shower. Doesn’t hold soap though.
customer_reviews.author: KimB

customer_reviews.title: The best purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that you get two brushes for the price of one. A handheld one and a long handle back brush. I find both are easy to use and they both help fight cellulite.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: the long brush is soft enough and easy to use/ the smaller hand brush is a tad stiff but works
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Worthington

customer_reviews.title: Love the back brush
customer_reviews.text: The back brush is perfect! Just soft enough but not too soft, easy to keep clean. The other scrubber is very rigid, more so than I expected, so I really can't use it much.
customer_reviews.author: robbylea

customer_reviews.title: Best back scrubber I’ve tried. Love it
customer_reviews.text: The bristles are the perfect texture. I feel like my back is actually clean now.
customer_reviews.author: snp

customer_reviews.title: Better than a regular brush.
customer_reviews.text: Feels better than a brush and handle is long enough to reach to clean back.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Great product, soft bristles and perfect for hard to reach areas.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this back brush, especially the massaging side! I also love that it’s so easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Robinson

product_meta.title: Cinlitek Body Brush Back Brush Scrubber, Silicone Body Shower Brush, Long Handle Back Scrubber for Shower, Body Shower Scrubber Cellulite Massager & Remover Brush Mitt for women and men- 2 Pack
feature_bullets: Silicone Back Bath Brush and 2 Pack Brush： The silicone body exfoliator brush and cellulite remover brush is made of top-quality silicone. Package included 1pcs Shower Back Scrubber Brush + 1pcs Body Scrubber Cellulite Massage Brush

Soft Silicone Body Brush: Durable ergonomic design silicone shower body brush, it is suitable for exfoliating dry skin and cleansing the entire body, back washer for shower. The soft silicone bristles remove dead skin leaving it feeling smoother, will never hurt your skin and good for sensitive skin, and help to deep clean your body. Now you can bath and shower with comfort.

Gentle Massage Brush: Soft massage nodules is on other side can massage while you brush, It very helpful to make you relaxed & refreshed. Amazing cellulite brush by massaging away your fat pockets, anti cellulite massager.

14.8inch Long Handle Body Scrub Brush: The size of the silicone shower back brush with long handle is designed to help reach each part of your body. At 14.8inch x 3.3inch this bath brush is perfect for reaching all areas of your body.

Convenience and Quick Dry Bath Scrubber: This silicone back shower brush design with a round hold on the end of handle, allows you to optionally hang it on any places. Silicone brush quick-dry than Bristles Brush.
